channel.title: Cloud on Dave's Site
channel.description: Recent content in Cloud on Dave's Site

item.title: Free SSL Courtesy Of Cloudflare
item.author: dave@petzel.email (David Petzel)
item.description: I was recently listening to an episode of Security Now when I heard them mention that Cloudflare has a free tier. While I’ve never personally used their service I’ve heard about it a ton of times. Hearing that they have a free tier peaked my interest so I went exploring.
